description_for_human: Access comprehensive ARC-72 NFT data including collections, tokens, transfers, marketplace listings, ARC-200 tokens, DEX pools, and staking information on the Algorand blockchain.
description_for_model: This plugin provides access to ARC-72 NFT data on the Algorand blockchain. It can retrieve NFT collections, individual tokens, transfer history, marketplace listings and sales, ARC-200 token data, DEX pool information, and staking data. Use this when users ask about NFTs, blockchain data, or need to query specific NFT collections, tokens, or market activity.
